DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct evaluate Bausch & Lomb PureVision Multi-Focal contact lens compare Bausch & Lomb SofLens59 contact lens worn adapt soft contact lens wearer daily wear basis .
DOC.brief_title: Performance Evaluation Contact Lenses Among Population Adapted Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Subjects must clear central cornea free anterior segment disorder . Subjects must adapt soft contact lens wearer agree wear study lens daily wear basis least eight hour day approximately two week . Subjects must wear lens eye lens must manufacture brand . Subjects participate drug device clinical investigation within two week prior entry study and/or period study participation . Subjects systemic disease affect ocular health Subjects active ocular disease use ocular medication . Subjects corneal surgery ( eg , refractive surgery ) .
